Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers have dominated the Rockies all season, winning five of their seven games played.
The Rockies can still play spoiler as they play the Dodgers six times over the final nine games of the 2024 Major League Baseball regular season.
The Dodgers enter this series fresh off a postseason berth—the twelfth straight season they have done so, going back to the 2013 season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers have a three-game lead over the second-place San Diego Padres.

The season is all but over for the Rockies as they come into today’s game last place in that National League West with a 59-94 record, thirty-two games back from the leading Dodgers and twenty-six games back from the final National League wild-card spot.
Others: The Dodgers' Shohei Ohtani went six-for-six, blasted three home runs, and stole two bases in the series finale against the Marlins.
Veteran left-handed pitcher Clayton Kershaw threw an eighty-pitch bullpen session in Miami this past week as he continues rehabbing a bone spur in his left toe.
